properties.areaDesc: Sheridan Foothills; Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 2:45AM MST until February 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 5 inches. Northwest winds gusting up to 40 mph.

* WHERE...In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. In Montana, Southern
Rosebud, Southern Big Horn and Bighorn Canyon.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult due to snow, gusty winds
and areas of blowing snow. Roadways impacted include I-90 from
Lodge Grass to Sheridan, and US-212 over Lame Deer Divide.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY
